text.section:
On any matter that is to be acted on by trustees:
Each trustee has equal rights in the management and conduct of trust business; and
The trustees act by majority of the trustees.

The trustees may act other than at a meeting of the trustees if the minimum number of trustees necessary to authorize or to take action at a meeting consent in a signed record. Prompt notice of the action taken must be promptly communicated to all trustees.
A trustee may not vote by proxy.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 35, effective July 12, 2012.
